statements: DELETE FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold;
DELETE FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock <= min_stock_threshold OR max_stock_threshold < 50;
DELETE FROM Stockout_Log WHERE reason LIKE '%damaged%';
DELETE FROM Inventory_Items WHERE item_id = 1001 AND stock_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Stockout_Log WHERE stockout_date < '2022-01-01' AND reason = 'Damaged Goods';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 2 AND location_id = 3;
DELETE FROM StockStatus WHERE current_stock < low_stock_threshold OR current_stock = 0;
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM Products WHERE quantity < 10 AND price > 100;
